name: re_link
description:
In the middle of a storm in the near future you find yourself in the office of the most powerful man in the Floating City. He's dead, and as far as you can tell, you were the one that shot him. Now, with Corporate Security trying to force their way in, a mysterious voice in your head and time running out, you need answers...

Who are you, and what the hell have you done?

Re_link is a short text based Cyberpunk adventure set in a future that's a lot closer than most of us would want to believe.
